data.title: Jennifer Aniston Brings Courteney Cox to Tears With Birthday Tribute
data.meta_description: Jennifer Aniston honored her former Friends costar and longtime bestie Courteney Cox on her 60th birthday with a touching message.
data.text:
Jennifer Aniston is reminding Courteney Cox that she'll always be there for her.

Proving their friendship will never be stuck in second gear, The Morning Show star shared a heartfelt tribute in honor of her longtime bestie's birthday.

"Celebrating this powerful, magical, mystical, interesting, interested, ferociously talented girl today!" Jennifer wrote in her June 16 Instagram post. "My sweet CC. She's funny like no other, STUNNING on the inside and out. Independent in the most gorgeous way, cares for everyone even if she doesn't know you."

Jennifer's post celebrating Courteney's 60th birthday was also peppered with sweet memories of the duo. From a throwback selfie of the women with Courteney's daughter Coco Arquette—who the actress shares with ex David Arquette—to a clip of the pair from Friends with a crying face edited over both of them, the 55-year-old included plenty of sweet, cheeky memories in her post.
